Subskills.name: Weakening Powder
Subskills.description: Slows and reduces attack rating of targets hit.

Subskills.name: Adjusted Formula
Subskills.description: Significantly reduce enemy attack rating and increase monster damage taken when inside smoke bomb.

Subskills.name: Acidic Component
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inflict armor break.

Subskills.name: Thick Clouds
Subskills.description: Increases smoke bomb area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Greater Impact
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by smoke bomb.

Subskills.name: Preparation
Subskills.description: Smoke bomb has a chance to bounce releasing an additional smoke cloud.

Subskills.name: Smoke Trail
Subskills.description: Smoke bomb now leaves a trail of smoke behind you dealing increased damage. Smoke bomb now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Swift Deploy
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using smoke bomb.

Subskills.name: Burning Weakness
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Stealth Zone
Subskills.description: Throw out smoke bombs in all directions forming a massive cloud increasing your movement speed inside of it. Smoke bomb now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Monster Cleansing
Subskills.description: Smoke bomb consumes damage over time debuffs from monsters inside of it dealing full damage instantly.
